committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits

official_title: A bill to extend the authority of the Secretary of the Treasury to enter into agreements with certain cities and counties for the withholding of city and county income and employment taxes from the pay of Federal employees who are residents of, or regularly employed in, such cities and counties.

summary.text: Amends Federal law relating to the withholding of city or county income or employment taxes from Federal employee pay to remove the requirement that such city or county be within a political boundary of which 500 or more persons are regularly employed by the Federal Government.

titles.title: A bill to extend the authority of the Secretary of the Treasury to enter into agreements with certain cities and counties for the withholding of city and county income and employment taxes from the pay of Federal employees who are residents of, or regularly employed in, such cities and counties.
